接口 IIItemHandlerModifiable

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.Iterable<crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack>

    public interface IIItemHandlerModifiable
extends java.lang.Iterable<crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack>
    Used for interacting with inventories.
    ZenClass:
    mods.forge.items.IItemHandlerModifiable

        crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack getStackInSlot(int slot)
        Get the item stack in a slot.
        参数:

      • insertItem

        crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack insertItem(int slot,
                                            crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack itemStack,
                                            boolean simulate)
        Try to insert an item stack in a specific slot.
        参数:
        slot - The slot to insert into.
        itemStack - The item stack to insert.
        simulate - Whether the insertion should be only simulated, or actually performed.
        返回:
        The remaining item stack.

      • extractItem

        crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack extractItem(int slot,
                                             int amount,
                                             boolean simulate)
        Try to extract from an item stack in a specific slot.
        参数:
        slot - The slot to extract from.
        amount - How much to extract.
        simulate - Whether the extraction should be only simulated, or actually performed.
        返回:
        The item stack that was extracted.

      • getSlotLimit

        int getSlotLimit(int slot)
        参数:
        slot - The slot to check.
        返回:
        How many items can fit into the slot at most.

      • isItemValid

        boolean isItemValid(int slot,
                    crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack stack)
        Check whether an item stack could potentially be inserted into a slot.
        参数:
        slot - The slot to check.
        stack - The stack to check.
        返回:
        Whether the slot is valid for the stack.

      • addItems

        default boolean addItems(boolean simulate,
                         java.util.List<crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack> itemStacks)
        Simulates the insertion of items into a target inventory, then optionally performs the insertion.

        Simulating will not modify any of the input parameters. Insertion will either succeed completely, or fail without modifying anything. This method should be called with simulate true first, then simulate false, only if it returned true.
        参数:
        simulate - whether to simulate (true) or actually perform the insertion (false)
        itemStacks - the items to insert into handler.
        返回:
        true if the insertion succeeded, false otherwise.
